price: „Збрканих ли снова!“ Рекоше они, „ми снове не знамо да тумачимо.“
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمٖۖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحۡلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū aḍghāthu aḥlāmin wamā naḥnu bitawīli al-aḥlāmi biʿālimīna
